game.name: Iron Dice
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The empire has fallen. Will you reunite its factions or forge your own path? Iron Dice is an open-ended grand strategy game set in a fictional, early medieval world. Outmaneuver and outwit your neighboring kingdoms as you develop your economy, research new technologies, and conquer territory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The empire has fallen. Will you reunite its factions or forge your own path? Iron Dice is an open-ended grand strategy game set in a fictional, early medieval world. Outmaneuver and outwit your neighboring kingdoms as you develop your economy, research new technologies, and conquer territory.
